author: 宝禾先生
description:
In the eyes of everyone, Feng Yao, with his extraordinary appearance and successful career, was the perfect male god.

#How to become friends with Boss Feng# There were countless people leaving such comments everyday. 

His name, Feng Yao, was simply another synonym for “excellence”. 

One day, however–

A verified Weibo account suddenly exposed Boss Feng’s personal diary.

The contents all revolved around one person: Wu YunFei.

The infamous rich hedonist*.

There were tearful complaints between the words and lines of his diary entries. 

It was a far cry away from the image Boss Feng usually portrayed!

For a while, the entire network was boiling.

#Exposing Mr. Perfect’s true colors online#
#Speaking Out My Heart’s Thoughts: The Series#
#Asking everyone to stand by and observe a living sand sculpture**#
#A live documentary of Boss Feng’s process of becoming bent#

Note :
*纨绔子弟: hedonistic son of rich parents
**Sand sculpture (沙雕-ShāDiāo) is a homophone for (vulgar, derogatory) idiot (傻屌-ShǎDiǎo).>
